snippet.title: Pixel Force: Halo Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Fan made game by Eric Ruth demakes Halo into a 2D NES style sidescrolling shooting game. Unfortunately, all trailers of this wonderful game have been taken down. Fortunately, I've managed to get this copy of the trailer back up and running.

Archive/Download: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/12CzxOM9OhJ23TrIIz2q41xc7dwW_cFB7
Website: http://ericruthgames.weebly.com/
Alternative Download: https://pixel-force-halo.en.softonic.com/

--------------------
Original Description:
Pixel Force: Halo continues the 8-bit de-make series Eric Ruth Games started this year. Through battling the Covenant in this 2D side-scroller, the player will find a multitude of weapons and vehicles from the original Bungie created series. Master Chief platform hops his way through each mission, guided by Cortana and uses 8 directional shooting in a Contra-esque game play style. 

Come January 2011, Pixel Force: Halo will be available for free download on the PC platform.

Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20110329055526/http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VW5IMmfDvmQ
